name: Skelemend
description:
Skelemend

Skelemend is a PC puzzle where you need to merge skeleton's head and body together. Game supports keyboard and mouse and works in the fullscreen. 

Demo of the game already has 10 levels.

Use Space and Arrows or AD to move the skeleton body and mouse with held left button to throw the head. Your goal is to make them merge into one!

Titles

Game was created with the use of following materials:

  • Organ Ambience, Calm, A by InspectorJ
  • Snowfall final by ShadyDave
  • Calm synth music by ShortRecord
  • 2D Platformer Tileset by Danil Chernyaev
